statement.p: Find the slope of the line that goes through the points (14,-10) and (13,-7).
Enter your answer as an integer or a reduced fraction in the form A/B

ul.li: \displaystyle\frac{{-{7}-{\left(-{10}\right)}}}{{{13}-{\left({14}\right)}}}=\frac{{3}}{{-{{1}}}} which reduces to \displaystyle-{3} (if it's not already reduced)
